author: Newt Gingrich
title: Newt Gingrich: Coronavirus and China – Why lawsuits should be one way to make country pay for pandemic
description: The Chinese Communist dictatorship lied to the world and got its puppet head of the World Health Organization to also lie to the world.
content:
